repeatfrom*to repeatthese4rows4moretimes m sm k p k row6 k p k sm *p5 k1 repeatfrom*tom repeatsectiona sm k p k repeatrows1-62moretimes repeatrow1ofsectiona2x © olga olach 2 piece should measure approximately 21 inches in length bind off all sts knitwise and leave a 20 inch tail do not weave in the ends yet block piece by soaking in tepid water with a few drops of wool wash or baby shampoo for 20-30 min remove from water and gently squeeze do not wring excess water out and roll in a dry towel to remove remaining excess water lay on a flat surface stretching and pinning piece to specified measurements and allow to dry completely using the tail sew the cast on edge to the bound off edge using mattress stitch seaming cast on and bind off edges weave in remaining ends a note on charts the following 2 pages contain the charts that correspond to each section of the written instructions above charts are a useful and commonly used tool in knitting and can inform the knitter as to what the knitted fabric should look like on the rs i have included them here as an optional teaching tool for the new knitter each box represents 1 st use the
